ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 550
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok,  so Wolfy,  you answered that for me....  I would most likely fall into the I just love the social aspects of history, but I can t afford pure linen &
ygData.messageBody:
Ok,  so Wolfy,  you answered that for me....  I would most likely fall into the "I just love the social aspects of history, but I can't afford pure linen & silk velvet for my clothing" category...  I think the people who insist that everyone be 100% accurate, and condem others who may only be 85% accurate ruin it for everyone

Kat (just my Humble opinion)

  Toni <silly_girl4ever@...> wrote:

Society for creative anacronysm... or something like that... A historical recreation group...  I was going to join,  but I heard that the fun is taken out of it  because most everything hads to be 100% historically correct (please correct me if I'm wrong on that)

Kat

  Su <suceress@...> wrote:

What is SCA?
luv,
-Su
